notes: First Hyundai sold in North America (1986). Based on Mitsubishi platform with Mitsubishi engines. Replaced by Accent in 1994. 1980s carburetor and early fuel injection systems. Data sourced from Wikipedia, January 2025 revision.
Second generation Y2 (1988-1993), introduced to North America in 1989. Mitsubishi-based platform. Data sourced from Wikipedia, January 2025 revision.
